name: Not Dat Saw Game
description:
Game made for Weekly Game Jam 155

Theme: Cycle

How to play: Click on screen to fly towards position. Avoid the saws and collect blue coins to finish a cycle. While any coins remain on screen, you cant finish the cycle.

Audio: https://freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/378665/ changed the pitch and speed of it a bit.

I think I had a good idea for the jam - its all about cycles and parts of it repeating, part of it changeing - but had too little time to finish the game. There is no juice in the gameplay. Had huge time constraints and was not feeling very motivated. But finished something!

Sometimes it feels good to do a janky game and still "release" it. I hope it helps with my anxiety to show my games to others.
